com.TeamJava.PaddleWars
Class PaddleWars

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.TeamJava.PaddleWars.PaddleWars
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
public class PaddleWars
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is the main clas for the paddle Wars game. It creates and controls all the other classes, paddle, ball, bonusManager. It also controls event handling and AI.

See Also:
paddle, ball, bonusManager, Serialized Form

Ball

public static ball[] Ball
An Array of ball Objects, which is responisble for creating all instances of the ball class., for Game Ball, and Bonus Ball use. An Array must be used so that the number of instances of the ball class can be determined by the code.

Constructor Detail

PaddleWars

public PaddleWars(int width,
                  int height,
                  java.applet.AudioClip[] gameSounds,
                  java.awt.Image backGround,
                  java.awt.Image[][] Paddles,
                  java.awt.Image[] fireBall,
                  java.awt.Image[][] lightningBall,
                  java.awt.Image[] explosion,
                  int gameMode)
The constructor for PaddleWars, used to pass in settings and resources.

Parameters:
width - The width of the area in which the game should operate.
height - The height of the area in which the game should operate.
gameSounds - All the sounds needed for the game.
backGround - The background image of the game.
Paddles - All the paddle Images possible.
fireBall - The images needed for the fireball animation.
lightningBall - The images needed for the lightning ball animation.
explosion - The explosion image.
gameMode - The current game mode.
Method Detail

start

public void start()
Method used to start up the game. Initializes all the variables and objects.

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Standard paint method, converted to a 2D paint method.

Parameters:
g - The graphics object.

hyperKey

public int hyperKey(int acessMode,
                    int paddle,
                    int giveHyperKey)
Method used to set, and/or return if a player has the Hyper key.

Parameters:
acessMode - If you want to set if a player has the hyper key, or just find out if they do or not.
paddle - Which paddle you want to perform the operations on.
giveHyperKey - ive them the Hyper Key or not, 0= not, 1=yes. Only relevant if acessMode = 1.
Returns:
The Hyper key Status of the player.

setHyperMovement

public int setHyperMovement(int acessMode,
                            int paddle,
                            int increasePercent)
Sets or returns the current hyper movement value for a player.

Parameters:
acessMode - Set it, 1, or retunrn it, 0.
paddle - Which paddle to set or find.
increasePercent - The percent by which to increase the hyper movement value.
Returns:
The current hyper movement value for a player.

public void setScore(int P1,
                     int P2)
This method is used to increase the score.

Parameters:
P1 - The value by which to increase player 1's score.
P2 - The value by which to increase player 2's score.

setBonusRunning

public void setBonusRunning(boolean isRunning)
This method sets if a bonus is running or not.

Parameters:
isRunning - true = running, flase = not.

setpredictTime

public void setpredictTime(int time)
This method sets the predict time left until a computer predicts the balls loation.

Parameters:
time - The time till the AIshould predict the ball location.

setpredictTime

public void setpredictTime(int WhichPaddle,
                           int time)
This method sets the predict time left until a computer predicts the balls loation, or tells it to strafe, depending on which paddle the ball just hit.

Parameters:
WhichPaddle - Which paddle the ball just hit.
time - Time until the AI should predict the ball's loation.

BonusTimer

private void BonusTimer()
This method organizes the binus ball timer. It reduces it until it is equal to 0, then it creates a new bonus ball, and a new binus type, and timer.

giveMissilePaddle

public void giveMissilePaddle(int player)
This method gives a missile paddle to a player. And resets all their missiles to ready.

Parameters:
player - Which player to give the missile paddle.

MissileHandler

private void MissileHandler(int player)
This method finds if a player has a missile ready, and if so, calls on the FireMissile method to fire that missile.

Parameters:
player - Which player is trying to fire the misile.

FireMissile

private void FireMissile(int player,
                         int missile)
This method fires a misile, and then sets that missile to not availible.

Parameters:
player - Which player is firing the missile.
missile - Which missile of theirs to fire.

resetMissile

public void resetMissile(int player,
                         int missile)
This method resets a missile, stopping it from running anymore.

Parameters:
player - Which player owns the missile.
missile - Which missile of that players to reset.

setStunned

public void setStunned(int paddle,
                       int splits)
This method sets the stunned time on a paddle.

Parameters:
paddle - Which paddle to set stunned.
splits - For how many spilt seconds they should be stunned.

endGame

private void endGame(int winner)
This method ends the game.

Parameters:
winner - Which player won the game.

exitGame

public void exitGame()
This method is used to exit the game. It stops the thread, and releases any objects and variables, giving the resources back to the system.

DelayTimer

private void DelayTimer()
This method manages all the timers present in this class.

run

public void run()
This is a standard run method for a thread. this method get run when the gameThread is called to run, and continues to do so until the exitGame method is called, or paused.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
